summary: Implements a comprehensive pipeline that converts PDF files into enriched, structured document objects by selecting appropriate backends, loading OCR models (EasyOCR, Tesseract, GLM), preprocessing pages, performing layout analysis, detecting table structures, assembling pages, and optionally profiling performance.
business_intent: Enable end‑to‑end transformation of PDFs into searchable, analyzable DoclingDocument representations for downstream tasks such as extraction, indexing, and analytics.
